settings.title: Purpose
settings.text: ‚Äï Living On Purpose | To act regardless of fear, reach your highest potential and do what excites.

Hey :) I'm Daniel, the founder of On Purpose and Altiigo!

We really appreciate you taking the time to get to know us

Altiigo began with my passion for living ‚ÄúOn Purpose‚Äù and finding enjoyable ways to become the best version of ourselves ‚Äúnaturally‚Äù.

But really,

the origin story dates back many years ago...

when I was a kid, I was always the type of person to do things fearlessly or much thought about consequences.

It led to mistakes, injuries, and getting in trouble (a lot)...

but that's how I learned best :)

By failing, learning, and doing. But,

as years went by, I slowly conformed to insecurities around me and what everyone told me ‚Äì

"Don't do that, you'll embarrass yourself", "think before you act" or "keep it to yourself" and I developed an insecurity to do what I genuinely love and think is right.

My entire life, I would always push things for later and avoid things that would cause me to stand out in fear of embarrassment and failure.

Businesses, relationships, projects, competitions, working out, all of it.

During the pandemic, it got really bad - enough to play video games for 12-14 hours a day because everything was overwhelming.

When I realized, this mentality was killing my dreams and happiness.

I mustered up the courage to give myself one last chance. To take imperfect action. To fail fast. Learn fast. Win fast.

After studying how our brains are wired, building sustainable systems to combat burnout + my fears, and perform at a high level to see incredible results in such short amount of time.

I felt a moral obligation and drive to share what I've learned with others.

I started mentoring those around me and eventually began coaching CEOs, busy lawyers, Google employees, influencers with millions of followers, and ambitious students ‚Äì all revolving around a central theme of imperfect action.

However, I realized, my ability to impact lives were limited by time and capacity.

Luckily, through the Cansbridge Scholars I met friends who shared a similar passion for acting regardless of fear and in a matter of weeks ‚Äì we started Altiigo (imperfectly).

Before any sort of behaviour, there‚Äôs a cue. My vision for Altiigo is for our pieces to ignite your alter ego, remind and hold you accountable to your dream, and to live ‚ÄúOn Purpose‚Äù.

Live On Purpose/ (ùò±ùò©ùò≥ùò¢ùò¥ùò¶) | To act regardless of fear, reach your highest potential and do what excites.

Thanks for being a part of our journey :) we couldn't be who we are without you

‚Äì Dan

Hey :) I'm Daniel, the founder of On Purpose Coaching Ltd. and Altiigo!

We really appreciate you taking the time to get to know us

Altiigo began with my passion for living ‚ÄúOn Purpose‚Äù and finding enjoyable ways to become the best version of ourselves ‚Äúnaturally‚Äù.

But really,

the origin story dates back many years ago...

when I was a kid, I was always the type of person to do things seemingly without fear or much thought about consequences.

It led to mistakes, injuries, and getting in trouble (a lot)...

but that's how I learned best!

By failing, learning, and doing. But,

as years went by, I slowly conformed to insecurities around me and what everyone told me ‚Äì "Don't do that, you'll embarrass yourself", "think before you act" or "keep it to yourself" and I developed an insecurity to do what I actually love and think is right.

I didn't realize until I my third year in university, how much this mindset affected me.

I would always end up pushing things off and avoid things that would cause me to stand out in fear of embarrassment or failure.

Businesses, relationships, projects, competitions, working out, all of it.

During the pandemic, it got really bad - enough to play video games for 12-14 hours a day because everything was overwhelming.

When I realized, this mentality was killing my dreams and happiness.

I decided to give it one more shot. To take imperfect action. To fail fast. Learn fast. Win fast.

After realizing how our brains are wired, building sustainable systems to combat our fears, and perform at a high level to see incredible results in such short amount of time.

I felt a moral obligation and drive to share what I've learned with others.

I started mentoring those around me and eventually began coaching CEOs, busy lawyers, Google employees, influencers with millions of followers, and ambitious students ‚Äì all revolving around a central theme of imperfect action.

However, I realized, my ability to impact lives were limited by time and capacity. Desperate for a solution,

I became a founding scholar in the Cansbridge Scholars.

Here, I connected with like-minded individuals who shared a similar passion for acting regardless of fear and eventually - Altiigo was born.

Before any sort of behaviour, there‚Äôs a cue. My vision for Altiigo is for our pieces to ignite your alter ego, remind and hold you accountable to your dream, and to live ‚ÄúOn Purpose‚Äù.

Live On Purpose/ (ùò±ùò©ùò≥ùò¢ùò¥ùò¶) | To act regardless of fear, reach your highest potential and do what excites.

‚Äì Dan
